page.title: 18Arable,Fruit and Vegetable.
page.content: Crops include wheat, barley, oilseed rape and oats plus cutting of grass for sileage and hay. E.E.C quota Regulations greatly affect the acreage of crops grown each year. The fields are large and economical enabling large tractors and ploughing attachments to be used.Sub-contractors are used by many farmers for hedgecutting, drilling and at harvest He may only employ one cowman and perhaps one labourer extra to his own family's labour for the routine running of the farm. Modern methods can mean one man being able to plough or sow a field in just hours. A proportion of potatoes, swedes and turnips are grown - some as winter feed for the cattle. At Nevill Holt there is a mushroom farm and nearby a soft fruit farm, which is self-pick; saving the farmer labour costs.
